about_the_game:
Defy the Gods in this 3D Roguelike RPG.

As Titan Prometheus, you embark on a legendary quest to steal the sacred fire. Explore treacherous dungeons in this turn-based tactical RPG, where every step unveils a new challenge.

Rogue Titan is a must-play for fans of roguelikes, turn-based tactics, and Greek mythology-inspired adventures.


Key Features:
• Master Turn-Based Tactics: Command Prometheus in tactical, grid-based combat. Exploit enemy weaknesses and position your attacks for maximum impact.
• Endless Permadeath, Evolving Strategies: No two runs are the same. Procedurally generated dungeons and persistent permadeath make each attempt a unique test of skill.
• 3D Roguelike RPG: Experience a fresh take on the Roguelike genre with stunning 3D environments and captivating visuals.
• Turn-Based Tactical Combat: Hone your strategic skills in a deep combat system that rewards precise positioning and tactical thinking.
• Procedural Generation: Each playthrough offers endless replayability.

short_description: Battle your way to Olympus in this tactical Turn-Based roguelike, where each combat is a deadly dance, and the world reacts in sync to your every move. As the Titan Prometheus, master strategic combat, upgrade abilities, and face mythic foes and permadeath in procedurally generated dungeons.
